select sri.id, sri.code, sri.user_id, sri.`type`, sri.content, sri.total_price, sri.address, sri.images, sri.longitude, sri.latitude, sri.status, sri.work_user_id, sri.create_date, ui1.name as userName, ui1.code as userCode, ui1.images as userImages, ui2.name as workName, ui2.images as workImages from service_reserve_info sri left join user_info ui1 on (ui1.id = sri.user_id) left join user_info ui2 on (ui2.id = sri.work_user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{serviceReserveInfo.userName},'%')
AND ui2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{serviceReserveInfo.workName},'%')
AND sri.`type` = #{serviceReserveInfo.type}
order by sri.create_date desc

AND sri.`id` = #{id}

select sri.id, sri.code, sri.user_id, sri.`type`, sri.content, sri.total_price, sri.address, sri.images, sri.longitude, sri.latitude, sri.status, sri.work_user_id, sri.create_date, ui1.name as userName, ui1.images as userImages, ui2.name as workName, ui2.images as workImages from service_reserve_info sri left join user_info ui1 on (ui1.id = sri.user_id) left join user_info ui2 on (ui2.id = sri.work_user_id) where 1 = 1

AND sri.`status` = 1 AND ui1.`user_id` != #{userId} order by sri.create_date desc
